      • readItem

        List<Object> readItem​(Object parentInstance,
                      IJsonParsingContext context)
               throws IOException,
                      BindingException
        Reads a JSON/YAML object storing the associated data in a Java class instance and adds the resulting instance to the provided collector.

        When called the current JsonToken of the JsonParser is expected to be a JsonToken.FIELD_NAME that is the first field of the object.

        After returning the current JsonToken of the JsonParser is expected to be a JsonToken.END_OBJECT representing the end of the object for this class.

        Parameters:
        parentInstance - the Java instance for the object containing this object
        context - the parsing context
        Returns:
        the instance or null if no data was parsed
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurred while reading the parsed content
        BindingException - if an error occurred parsing content into java instances

      • readItem

        Object readItem​(Object parentInstance,
                StartElement start,
                IXmlParsingContext context)
         throws BindingException,
                IOException,
                XMLStreamException
        Reads a XML element storing the associated data in a Java class instance and adds the resulting instance to the provided collector.

        When called the next XMLEvent of the XMLStreamReader2 is expected to be a XMLStreamConstants.START_ELEMENT that is the XML element associated with the Java class.

        After returning the next XMLEvent of the XMLStreamReader2 is expected to be a the next event after the XMLStreamConstants.END_ELEMENT for the XML XMLStreamConstants.START_ELEMENT element associated with the Java class.

        Parameters:
        parentInstance - the Java instance for the object containing this object
        start - the containing start element
        context - the parsing context
        Returns:
        the instance or null if no data was parsed
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurred while reading the parsed content
        BindingException - if an error occurred parsing content into java instances
        XMLStreamException - if an error occurred while parsing the content as XML

      • writeItem

        throws IOException,

        Throws:

      • copyBoundObject

        @NotNull
@NotNull Object copyBoundObject​(@NotNull
                                @NotNull Object item,
                                Object parentInstance)
                         throws BindingException
        Create a deep copy of the provided bound object.
        Parameters:
        item - the bound object to copy
        parentInstance - the new object's parent instance or null
        Returns:
        the copy
        Throws:
        BindingException - if an error occurred copying content between java instances
